Articles.Content:
The goal of this rocket is too set up an orbital comm system in 1 launch to allow unmanned flight.

Mods used

  1. Remote Tech v5 http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/remotetech-3/
  2. Remote Tech Compatability v5 http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/remotetech-probe-compatability/
  3. Mech Jeb 2.0.6 *Will update file on 2.0 full release http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/12384-PLUGIN-PART-0-19-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v2-0-7
  4. KW Rocketry v0.2.33 http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-1-kw-rocketry-overhauled/
  5. Zenith rocket family http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24787-0-19-1-Zenith-rocket-family

The payload is a 1 man pod connected to a poodle orbital engine and 6 small probes in fairings. The Launch vehicle is a modified Zenith III, it will run out of fuel on an optimum launch with a periapsis of at approximately -5km. The orbital engine can finish circularizing and still have approximately 3500 delta v for orbital changes and a possible mun transfer.

The Probes have a Comunotron 16 for communication with a range of 9Mm it is enough for orbital communications from geo-stationary orbit and is just long enough to bridge over too a high mun orbit. Abort will disconnect and launch the manned capsule and disable all engines, 10 will open the parachute, 1 will jettison fairings suggested before circularizing orbit.

http://www.filedropper.com/remotetechstarter
